SELECT /* [com.coway.trust.biz.payment.payment.service.impl.PaymentApiMapper.selectBillInfoRental] 20191010 - KR HAN */ Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID, Extent1.CUST_BILL_ID, Extent1.SALES_ORD_NO, Extent1.CUST_ID, Extent4.NAME CUST_NM, Extent1.APP_TYPE_ID, Extent2.CODE_NAME APP_TYPE_NM, Extent1.PV_YEAR, Extent1.PV_MONTH, Extent1.STUS_CODE_ID STUS_CODE_ID, Extent3.STUS_CODE_ID STUS_CODE_NM, CASE WHEN Extent6.REBATE_AMT_PER_INSTLMT IS NOT NULL THEN Extent1.MTH_RENT_AMT - Extent6.REBATE_AMT_PER_INSTLMT ELSE Extent1.MTH_RENT_AMT END MTH_RENT_AMT, Extent1.TOT_AMT FROM SAL0001D Extent1 LEFT JOIN SYS0013M Extent2 ON Extent2.CODE_ID = Extent1.APP_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0071D Extent3 ON Extent3.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0029D Extent4 ON Extent4.CUST_ID = Extent1.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT RENT_SO_ID, COUNT(1) AS RPF_CNT, NVL(SUM(RENT_AMT),0) AS RPF_CHARGE FROM PAY0022D WHERE RENT_DOC_TYPE_ID = 161 AND RENT_AMT >= 0 GROUP BY RENT_SO_ID ) Extent5 ON Extent5.RENT_SO_ID = Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN pay0286d extent6 ON extent6.ord_id = extent1.sales_ord_id WHERE 1=1
AND Extent1.SALES_ORD_NO = #{salesOrdNo} ORDER BY Extent1.SALES_ORD_NO

SELECT /* [com.coway.trust.biz.payment.payment.service.impl.PaymentApiMapper.selectSalesNotificationInfo] 20191014 - KR HAN */ Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID SALES_ORD_ID , Extent1.SALES_ORD_NO SALES_ORD_NO , Extent2.TEL_M1 MOBILE_NO , Extent2.EMAIL EMAIL FROM SAL0001D Extent1 JOIN SAL0027D Extent2 ON Extent1.CUST_CNT_ID = Extent2.CUST_CNTC_ID WHERE Extent1.SALES_ORD_NO = #{salesOrdNo}

SELECT /* [com.coway.trust.biz.payment.payment.service.impl.PaymentApiMapper.selectBankSelectBox] 20191014 - KR HAN */ BANK_ID BANK_ID , NAME BANK_NM FROM SYS0004M WHERE STUS_CODE_ID = '1' ORDER BY BANK_ID ASC
SELECT CODE_ID , CODE , CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = '130' AND DISAB = '0' ORDER BY CODE_ID
SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE((SELECT MESSAGE FROM SYS0052M WHERE ID = 'pay.msg.smseTRNo'),'{1}', #{salesOrdNo}), '{2}', #{payAmt}), '{3}', #{mobTicketNo}) FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MSC0015D ( SMS_ID , SMS_MSG , SMS_MSISDN , SMS_TYPE_ID , SMS_PRIO , SMS_REF_NO , SMS_BATCH_UPLOAD_ID , SMS_REM , SMS_START_DT , SMS_EXPR_DT , SMS_STUS_ID , SMS_RETRY , SMS_CRT_DT , SMS_CRT_USER_ID , SMS_UPD_DT , SMS_UPD_USER_ID , SMS_VENDOR_ID ) VALUES ( MSC0015D_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{smsTemplate} , #{mobileNo} , 975 , 1 , (SELECT SALES_ORD_ID FROM SAL0001D WHERE SALES_ORD_NO = #{salesOrdNo}) , 0 , UPPER('SMS E-TR TICKET VIA MOBILE APPS') , SYSDATE , SYSDATE + 1 , 4 , 0 , SYSDATE , #{crtUserId} , SYSDATE , #{crtUserId} , 2 )
mapper.select: SELECT REPLACE((SELECT MSG_EMAIL_TITLE FROM SYS0043D WHERE MSG_ID = 11 AND MSG_TYPE_ID = 2001),'{1}', #{mobTicketNo}) FROM DUAL

SELECT p.SALES_ORD_NO AS SALES_ORD_NO, p.PAY_AMT AS PAY_AMT, s47.USER_NAME AS COLLECTOR_CODE, s47.USER_FULL_NAME AS COLLECTOR_NAME, s26.STK_DESC AS STK_DESC, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RECEIPT_DT, s13.CODE_NAME AS PYMT_MODE, (select NVL (ca1.ADDR_DTL, ' ') || ', ' || NVL (ca1.STREET, ' ') || ', ' || NVL (ma1.AREA, ' ') || ', ' || NVL (ma1.POSTCODE, ' ') || ', ' || NVL (ma1.CITY, ' ') || ', ' || NVL (ma1.STATE, ' ') || ', ' || NVL (ma1.COUNTRY, ' ') FROM sal0001d som JOIN sal0045d i ON i.sales_ord_id = som.sales_ord_id LEFT JOIN sal0023d ca1 ON ca1.cust_add_id = i.add_id LEFT JOIN SYS0064M ma1 ON ma1.AREA_ID = ca1.AREA_ID where som.sales_ord_id = s1.SALES_ORD_ID) AS INST_ADDRESS FROM PAY0297D p JOIN SAL0001D s1 ON s1.SALES_ORD_NO = p.SALES_ORD_NO JOIN SAL0002D s2 ON s2.SALES_ORD_ID = s1.SALES_ORD_ID JOIN SYS0026M s26 ON s26.STK_ID = s2.ITM_STK_ID JOIN SYS0013M s13 ON s13.CODE_ID = p.PAY_MODE JOIN SYS0047M s47 ON s47.USER_ID = p.CRT_USER_ID WHERE p.MOB_TICKET_NO = #{mobTicketNo}
